channel.title: nautilus on Jürgen Gmach
channel.description: Recent content in nautilus on Jürgen Gmach

item.title: How to Sort Files and Folders in Nautilus So Folders Are Shown First
item.description: update settings gsettings set org.gtk.Settings.FileChooser sort-directories-first true check settings gsettings get org.gtk.Settings.FileChooser sort-directories-first via https://askubuntu.com/questions/1064482/
